kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=hospital, url=http://127.0.0.1:5001, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5001/ path_url=/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:5001/ status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.1.5 Python/3.12.9', 'Date': 'Mon, 09 Feb 2026 08:33:30 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '372', 'Connection': 'close'} body=[ { "age": 25, "contact": "9876543210", "disease": "Fever", "doctor_assigned": "Dr. Sharma", "gender": "Male", "id": 1, "patient_name": "Ravi Kumar" }, { "age": 32, "contact": "9123456780", "disease": "Diabetes", "doctor_assigned": "Dr. Priya", "gender": "Female", "id": 2, "patient_name": "Anitha Devi" } ]
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
